alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 10:29PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN INDIANA...SOUTHEASTERN ALLEGHENY...WESTMORELAND AND NORTH CENTRAL FAYETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1029 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Belsano to near McMurray. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bethel Park, Greensburg, McKeesport, Jeannette, Latrobe, Gastonville, West Mifflin, Murrysville, South Park Township, Jefferson Hills, North Versailles, Pleasant Hills, White Oak, Monessen, Clairton, Donora, Glassport, Mount Pleasant, Scottdale, and Monongahela. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 41 and 57. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 62 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for southwestern and west central Pennsylvania.
